PickMostRelevantLoop - Given two loops pick the one that&#39;s most relevant for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expansion.

If they are nested, this is the most nested. If they are neighboring, pick the later.

<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ReuseOrCreateCast - Arrange for there to be a cast of V to Ty at IP,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// reusing an existing cast if a suitable one (= dominating IP) exists, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// creating a new one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SCEVExpander::ReuseOrCreateCast(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#afa0b2fa29ba074f2b6ec9ac11163f2d9">Instruction::CastOps</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> IP) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This function must be called with the builder having a valid insertion</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// point. It doesn&#39;t need to be the actual IP where the uses of the returned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cast will be added, but it must dominate such IP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We use this precondition to produce a cast that will dominate all its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// uses. In particular, this is crucial for the case where the builder&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// insertion point &#42;is&#42; the point where we were asked to put the cast.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since we don&#39;t know the builder&#39;s insertion point is actually</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where the uses will be added (only that it dominates it), we are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not allowed to move it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> BIP = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a4e5c1b91bf5e2860398e3fa35c96b5af">GetInsertPoint</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Ret = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check to see if there is already a cast!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;U : V-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a411cf3e3932f209ce3374cb31adc1da6">users</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (U-&gt;getType() != Ty)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/castinst">CastInst</a> &#42;CI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;CastInst&gt;</a>(U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CI || CI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/castinst/#a3685b2128d8e6917000e4adc3b266ff6">getOpcode</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Found a suitable cast that is at IP or comes before IP. Use it. Note that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the cast must also properly dominate the Builder&#39;s insertion point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IP-&gt;getParent() == CI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>() &amp;&amp; &amp;&#42;BIP != CI &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (&amp;&#42;IP == CI || CI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a784097fca76abad9e815cf1692de79c4">comesBefore</a>(&amp;&#42;IP))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Ret = CI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a new cast.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Ret) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SCEVInsertPointGuard Guard(Builder, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Builder.SetInsertPoint(&amp;&#42;IP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mipsisd/#a422daf9aa810935178671306b651d69ba366e1eac31eeb1a1892d62ccfc0c8cf8">Ret</a> = Builder.CreateCast(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, V, Ty, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>-&gt;getName());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We assert at the end of the function since IP might point to an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction with different dominance properties than a cast</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (an invoke for example) and not dominate BIP (but the cast does).</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// InsertBinop - Insert the specified binary operator, doing a small amount</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of work to avoid inserting an obviously redundant operation, and hoisting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to an outer loop when the opportunity is there and it is safe.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SCEVExpander::InsertBinop(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ac26154a24f393f523c87cc5f8239f36c">Instruction::BinaryOps</a> Opcode,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#af43000d4dcb7d6d63cb6e36933ed3f6f">SCEV::NoWrapFlags</a> Flags, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsSafeToHoist) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fold a binop with constant operands.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Constant &#42;CLHS = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Constant&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Constant &#42;CRHS = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Constant&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Res;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do a quick scan to see if we have this binop nearby.  If so, reuse it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScanLimit = 6;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> BlockBegin = Builder.GetInsertBlock()-&gt;begin();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scanning starts from the last instruction before the insertion point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> IP = Builder.GetInsertPoint();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IP != BlockBegin) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    --IP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (; ScanLimit; --IP, --ScanLimit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t count dbg.value against the ScanLimit, to avoid perturbing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generated code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;DbgInfoIntrinsic&gt;</a>(IP))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ScanLimit++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> canGenerateIncompatiblePoison = &#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-textstubv5-cpp-/#ad2f3f81faa370c8bf9a1f81612c90adfab74797a67aabe2a47afe04d0a92997a0">Flags</a>&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a75d3582b0f0bc7a5123de92ada301e97">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;OverflowingBinaryOperator&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Conservatively, do not use any instruction which has any of exact</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IP-&gt;getOpcode() == (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)Opcode &amp;&amp; IP-&gt;getOperand(0) == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SCEVInsertPointGuard Guard(Builder, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ok, move up a level.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Builder.SetInsertPoint(Preheader-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// expandAddToGEP - Expand an addition expression with a pointer type into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a GEP instead of using ptrtoint+arithmetic+inttoptr. This helps</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BasicAliasAnalysis and other passes analyze the result. See the rules</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for getelementptr vs. inttoptr in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// http://llvm.org/docs/LangRef.html#pointeraliasing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for details.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Design note: The correctness of using getelementptr here depends on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ScalarEvolution not recognizing inttoptr and ptrtoint operators, as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// they may introduce pointer arithmetic which may not be safely converted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// into getelementptr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Design note: It might seem desirable for this function to be more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loop-aware. If some of the indices are loop-invariant while others</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// aren&#39;t, it might seem desirable to emit multiple GEPs, keeping the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loop-invariant portions of the overall computation outside the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// However, there are a few reasons this is not done here. Hoisting simple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// arithmetic is a low-level optimization that often isn&#39;t very</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// important until late in the optimization process. In fact, passes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// like InstructionCombining will combine GEPs, even if it means</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pushing loop-invariant computation down into loops, so even if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// GEPs were split here, the work would quickly be undone. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// LoopStrengthReduction pass, which is usually run quite late (and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// after the last InstructionCombining pass), takes care of hoisting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loop-invariant portions of expressions, after considering what</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// can be folded using target addressing modes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SCEVExpander::expandAddToGEP(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#af43000d4dcb7d6d63cb6e36933ed3f6f">SCEV::NoWrapFlags</a> Flags) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">         SE.DT.dominates(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V), &amp;&#42;Builder.GetInsertPoint()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;Idx = expand(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = OpsAndLoops.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a8a045d250952c0867382a9840ee18fdf">begin</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Expand the calculation of X pow N in the following manner:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Let N = P1 + P2 + ... + PK, where all P are powers of 2 Then:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// X pow N = (X pow P1) &#42; (X pow P2) &#42; ... &#42; (X pow PK).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExpandOpBinPowN = &#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, &amp;OpsAndLoops&#93;() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate how many times the same operand from the same loop is included</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into this power.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a403260df3a211e47e65f35fbfd9bee8faf5ccb8d51ca38e2f3329955fc0149cd4">Exponent</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t MaxExponent = <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#a30654b4b67d97c42ca3f9b6052dda916">UINT64&#95;MAX</a> &gt;&gt; 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No one sane will ever try to calculate such huge exponents, but if we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need this, we stop on UINT64&#95;MAX / 2 because we need to exit the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// below when the power of 2 exceeds our Exponent, and we want it to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1u &lt;&lt; 31 at most to not deal with unsigned overflow.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Check whether we can cheaply express the requested SCEV in terms of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the available PHI SCEV by truncation and/or inversion of the step.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900" lineLink="#ac9683831e3a4c794ca05bf81af366e5e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ac9683831e3a4c794ca05bf81af366e5e">canBeCheaplyTransformed</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr">SCEVAddRecExpr</a> &#42;Phi,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr">SCEVAddRecExpr</a> &#42;Requested,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsMatchingSCEV = PhiSCEV == Normalized;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expanded expression if the expanded expression&#39;s loop dominates the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop we insert to. Check now, so we can bail out early.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsMatchingSCEV &amp;&amp; !TryNonMatchingSCEV)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: this possibly can be reworked to avoid this cast at all.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a75d3582b0f0bc7a5123de92ada301e97">Instruction</a> &#42;TempIncV =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(PN.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#ab2db7609ec72b1af2f91d47e40dc3722">getIncomingValueForBlock</a>(LatchBlock));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!TempIncV)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether we can reuse this PHI node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LSRMode) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!isExpandedAddRecExprPHI(&amp;PN, TempIncV, L))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!isNormalAddRecExprPHI(&amp;PN, TempIncV, L))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Stop if we have found an exact match SCEV.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsMatchingSCEV) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlight">        IncV = TempIncV;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlight">        AddRecPhiMatch = &amp;PN;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try whether the phi can be translated into the requested form</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (truncated and/or offset by a constant).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((!TruncTy || InvertStep) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Record the phi node. But don&#39;t stop we might find an exact match</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlight">        AddRecPhiMatch = &amp;PN;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlight">        IncV = TempIncV;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlight">        TruncTy = Normalized-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr/#a1596600146d065022af8b9c4a1d0b427">getType</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AddRecPhiMatch) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ok, the add recurrence looks usable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remember this PHI, even in post-inc mode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InsertedValues.insert(AddRecPhiMatch);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remember the increment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><span class="doxyHighlight">      rememberInstruction(IncV);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Those values were not actually inserted but re-used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ReusedValues.insert(AddRecPhiMatch);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ReusedValues.insert(IncV);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AddRecPhiMatch;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SCEVInsertPointGuard Guard(Builder, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Another AddRec may need to be recursively expanded below. For example, if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this AddRec is quadratic, the StepV may itself be an AddRec in this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop. Remove this loop from the PostIncLoops set before expanding such</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For an expansion to use the postinc form, the client must call</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The induction variable&#39;s postinc expansion does not dominate this use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IVUsers tries to prevent this case, so it is rare. However, it can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// happen when an IVUser outside the loop is not dominated by the latch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block. Adjusting IVIncInsertPos before expansion begins cannot handle</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expansion with the value of the postinc user. Without fundamentally</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// changing the way postinc users are tracked, the only remedy is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inserting an extra IV increment. StepV might fold into PostLoopOffset,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but hopefully expandCodeFor handles that.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;StepV;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Expand the step somewhere that dominates the loop header.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have decided to reuse an induction variable of a dominating loop. Apply</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// truncation and/or inversion of the step.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TruncTy) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Truncate the result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TruncTy != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>-&gt;getType())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a> = Builder.CreateTrunc(Result, TruncTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Invert the result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InvertStep)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SCEVExpander::visitAddRecExpr(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr">SCEVAddRecExpr</a> &#42;S) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In canonical mode we compute the addrec as an expression of a canonical IV</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// using evaluateAtIteration and expand the resulting SCEV expression. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// way we avoid introducing new IVs to carry on the computation of the addrec</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// throughout the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For nested addrecs evaluateAtIteration might need a canonical IV of a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// type wider than the addrec itself. Emitting a canonical IV of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// proper type might produce non-legal types, for example expanding an i64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;0,+,2,+,1&#125; addrec would need an i65 canonical IV. To avoid this just fall</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// back to non-canonical mode for nested addrecs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CanonicalMode || (S-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevnaryexpr/#a689b72d735546bcbfc4b48a266503085">getNumOperands</a>() &gt; 2))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> expandAddRecExprLiterally(S);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a> &#42;Ty = SE.getEffectiveSCEVType(S-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr/#a1596600146d065022af8b9c4a1d0b427">getType</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Loop &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a> = S-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr/#a99ab4a82c6d7373e2e367986b9527bf0">getLoop</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SE.getTypeSizeInBits(PN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()) &gt;= SE.getTypeSizeInBits(Ty))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CanonicalIV = PN;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rewrite an AddRec in terms of the canonical induction variable, if</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><span class="doxyHighlight">      !S-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr/#a1596600146d065022af8b9c4a1d0b427">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a3b996fbf8458aafffc86cb98a68d0a47">isPointerTy</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The expansion of SCEV will either reuse a previous Value in ExprValueMap,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or expand the SCEV literally. Specifically, if the expansion is in LSRMode,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the SCEV contains any sub scAddRecExpr type SCEV, it will be expanded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// literally, to prevent LSR&#39;s transformed SCEV from being reverted. Otherwise,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the expansion will try to reuse Value from ExprValueMap, and only when it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fails, expand the SCEV literally.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SCEVExpander::expand(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;S) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute an insertion point for this SCEV object. Hoist the instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as far out in the loop nest as possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1505"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> InsertPt = Builder.GetInsertPoint();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1506"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can move insertion point only if there is no div or rem operations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// otherwise we are risky to move it over the check for zero denominator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SafeToHoist = &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SCEV &#42;S) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#affb88623037a9864e030154052747ba1">SCEVExprContains</a>(S, &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SCEV &#42;S) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SCEVConstant&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>-&gt;getRHS()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Division by non-zero constants can be hoisted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppcisd/#ad1c32e5bb1cb213fb836bc3d221e4f19a2ae057e4de45c51c89b7e5dc5053df62">SC</a>-&gt;getValue()-&gt;isZero();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All other divisions should not be moved as they may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// divisions by zero and should be kept within the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conditions of the surrounding loops that guard their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// execution (see PR35406).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><span class="doxyHighlight">              &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1523"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!OrigInc || !IsomorphicInc)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this phi has the same width but is more canonical, replace the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// original with it. As part of the &quot;more canonical&quot; determination,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replacing the congruent phi is sufficient because acyclic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// redundancy elimination, CSE/GVN, should handle the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rest. However, once SCEV proves that a phi is congruent,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it&#39;s often the head of an IV user cycle that is isomorphic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with the original phi. It&#39;s worth eagerly cleaning up the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// common case of a single IV increment so that DeleteDeadPHIs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can remove cycles that had postinc uses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Because we may potentially introduce a new use of OrigIV that didn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exist before at this point, its poison flags need readjustment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SCEV &#42;TruncExpr =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OrigInc == IsomorphicInc || TruncExpr != SE.getSCEV(IsomorphicInc) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654"><span class="doxyHighlight">      !SE.LI.replacementPreservesLCSSAForm(IsomorphicInc, OrigInc))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.SetInsertPoint(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute |Step|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;StepCompare = Builder.CreateICmp(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78ba15ae464950ac676919c2f0c7aafc706c">ICmpInst::ICMP&#95;SLT</a>, StepValue, Zero);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;AbsStep = Builder.CreateSelect(StepCompare, NegStepValue, StepValue);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute |Step| &#42; Backedge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1 Start + |Step| &#42; Backedge &lt; Start</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2 Start - |Step| &#42; Backedge &gt; Start</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And select either 1 or 2 depending on whether step is positive or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// negative. If Step is known to be positive or negative, only create</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// either 1 or 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ComputeEndCheck = &#91;&amp;&#93;() -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Checking &lt;u 0 is always false.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxisellowering-cpp/#ae1a90b5d85643644483b2ca70da4d13faed3fa7a5efe80dad3ea3d86cc14be246">Signed</a> &amp;&amp; Start-&gt;isZero() &amp;&amp; SE.isKnownPositive(Step))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2147"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint/#aa7cce62ac5cc6df09cce0535874336b7">ConstantInt::getFalse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>-&gt;getContext());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the backedge taken count and truncate or extended to the AR type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;TruncTripCount = Builder.CreateZExtOrTrunc(TripCountVal, Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;MulV, &#42;OfMul;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Step-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#a1ecb726f4e7b445057b795ed500546a0">isOne</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2154"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Special-case Step of one. Potentially-costly &#96;umul&#95;with&#95;overflow&#96; isn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2155"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// needed, there is never an overflow, so to avoid artificially inflating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2156"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the cost of the check, directly emit the optimized IR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MulV = TruncTripCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2158"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OfMul = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint/#aa7cce62ac5cc6df09cce0535874336b7">ConstantInt::getFalse</a>(MulV-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#ab3fc0225d8aaf8434026c3573f961f2c">getContext</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2160"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aac36edd0f1ce976f0025c98e88d3830ea62b6d55816cf737bfc6f42e60df1a3f2">Mul</a> = Builder.CreateIntrinsic(Intrinsic::umul&#95;with&#95;overflow, Ty,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2161"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              &#123;AbsStep, TruncTripCount&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2162"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;FMFSource=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;mul&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2163"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MulV = Builder.CreateExtractValue(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aac36edd0f1ce976f0025c98e88d3830ea62b6d55816cf737bfc6f42e60df1a3f2">Mul</a>, 0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;mul.result&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the backedge taken count type is larger than the AR type,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// check that we don&#39;t drop any bits by truncating it. If we are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dropping bits, then we have overflow (unless the step is zero).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcBits &gt; DstBits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2304"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2305"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Search for a SCEV subexpression that is not safe to expand.  Any expression</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2306"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that may expand to a !isSafeToSpeculativelyExecute value is unsafe, namely</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2307"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// UDiv expressions. We don&#39;t know if the UDiv is derived from an IR divide</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2308"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction, but the important thing is that we prove the denominator is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2309"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nonzero before expansion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2310"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2311"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IVUsers already checks that IV-derived expressions are safe. So this check is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2312"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only needed when the expression includes some subexpression that is not IV</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2313"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// derived.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2314"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Currently, we only allow division by a value provably non-zero here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2316"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2317"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We cannot generally expand recurrences unless the step dominates the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2318"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// header. The expander handles the special case of affine recurrences by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2319"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scaling the recurrence outside the loop, but this technique isn&#39;t generally</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2320"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// applicable. Expanding a nested recurrence outside a loop requires computing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2321"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// binomial coefficients. This could be done, but the recurrence has to be in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2322"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// perfectly reduced form, which can&#39;t be guaranteed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2323" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-scalarevolutionexpander-cpp-/scevfindunsafe"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-scalarevolutionexpander-cpp-/scevfindunsafe/#a36e2c5bb0b6711bd6abf032bd6bc0fe8">SCEVFindUnsafe</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2324" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-scalarevolutionexpander-cpp-/scevfindunsafe/#aa43dac6828e8a2b5488b509c36f69898"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-scalarevolutionexpander-cpp-/scevfindunsafe/#aa43dac6828e8a2b5488b509c36f69898">SE</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2327"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2328" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-scalarevolutionexpander-cpp-/scevfindunsafe/#a36e2c5bb0b6711bd6abf032bd6bc0fe8"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-scalarevolutionexpander-cpp-/scevfindunsafe/#a36e2c5bb0b6711bd6abf032bd6bc0fe8">SCEVFindUnsafe</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-scalarevolutionexpander-cpp-/scevfindunsafe/#aa43dac6828e8a2b5488b509c36f69898">SE</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-scalarevolutionexpander-cpp-/scevfindunsafe/#a54a95047a6956b76bc13fb597da9b233">CanonicalMode</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2329"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-scalarevolutionexpander-cpp-/scevfindunsafe/#aa43dac6828e8a2b5488b509c36f69898">SE</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-scalarevolutionexpander-cpp-/scevfindunsafe/#aa43dac6828e8a2b5488b509c36f69898">SE</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-scalarevolutionexpander-cpp-/scevfindunsafe/#a54a95047a6956b76bc13fb597da9b233">CanonicalMode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-scalarevolutionexpander-cpp-/scevfindunsafe/#a54a95047a6956b76bc13fb597da9b233">CanonicalMode</a>) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2336"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2339"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For non-affine addrecs or in non-canonical mode we need a preheader</span></CodeLine>
